synopsis.text:
Ackerman and Leonhart take center stage in this three-part OVA, "Attack on Titan: Lost Girls," adapted from the spinoff novel of the same name. In "Wall Sina, Goodbye," Annie Leonhart is tasked with a mission that requires her to be absent from her duties, leading her to seek help from her comrade Hitch Dreyse. In exchange for covering for her, Annie must solve a missing person case involving Carly Stratmann, the daughter of a wealthy businessman. With just one day to solve the case, Annie delves deep into the criminal underworld of Stohess District, uncovering secrets about the illegal drug coderoin and the Stratmann family.

In "Lost in the Cruel World," Mikasa Ackerman reflects on her past, haunted by memories of Eren and the time she almost lost everything. As fear consumes her, Mikasa experiences an alternate version of her past, questioning whether she can change the events that led to her current reality.

"Attack on Titan: Lost Girls" provides a fresh perspective on the popular anime series, focusing on the personal struggles and growth of two of its beloved characters. With its intense action and emotional depth, this OVA is a must-watch for any "Attack on Titan" fan.
